name: 林彥良
objective: This course is designed as an intensive teacher training program for students to become effective EFL teachers. Students are required to do the microteaching and present some selected chapters from the textbooks.
schedule:
Week 1  Course Introduction
Week 2  Approaches to ELT
Week 3  Lesson Planning
Week 4  Teaching four skills
Week 5  Competency-based Instruction
Week 6  Cross-disciplinary Instruction
Week 7  Integrating Issues in ELT 
Week 8  Classroom Observation I
Week 9  Midterm Exam
Week 10	Classroom Observation II
Week 11	International Education
Week 12	English Remedial Instruction
Week 13	Differentiated Instruction
Week 14	Language Assessment
Week 15	Evaluating ELT textbooks and materials
Week 16	Computer Assisted Language Learning
Week 17	Language Education Policies
Week 18	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Lesson Plans (first draft + revised version)  20%
Presentation & Report  20%
Attendance and participation  15%
Midterm & Final exams 30% 
Classroom Observation Reports  15%
materials: 中學英語文教材教法 (教育部 - 總策劃；葉錫南 - 主編)，五南書局出版。

name: 劉慧雯
objective:
透過本課程，使學生：1. 能瞭解外語群 / 語文領域英語文專長核心能力及專業知能。 2. 能編製教材與教案。 3. 能依據教材與教案執行教學。 4. 能建置個人學習檔案與教學心得報告。 5. 能熟知相關領域最新發展趨勢，並收集資訊以輔助教學及進行教材編修。
The object of this course are to ： 1.Understand the core abilities for English. 2.Construct and compile teaching materials and teaching plans. 3.Conduct teaching according to teaching plans and materials. 4.Construct and compile the learning portfolio and teaching reflection report for the subject matter. 5.Collect and deep understand related information and development for the subject matter to facilitate teaching and materials compilation.
schedule:
W1.  Course Orientation 
W2.  UbD GRASPS Task Design
W3.  Chapter 1 英語文教學與十二年國民基本教育
W4.  Chapter 2 英語教學之課程發展理論與趨勢
W5.  No class: Holiday
W6.  高中英文教學實務分享
W7.  國中英語教學實務分享
W8.  雙語教育議題探討
W9.  教學參訪
W10.  Chapter 3 素養導向之英語文教學
W11.  Chapter 4 英語文跨領域統整教學
W12.  Chapter 5 英語文適性教學
W13.  教檢準備與實習分享
W14.  Chapter 6 議題融入英語教學
W15.  Chapter 7 教學設計與教案編寫
W16.  Teaching Demonstration 
W17.  No class: Holiday
W18.  Final
scorePolicy:
Selected chapters presentation and assignments: 30%
UbD GRASPS Performance Task Design: 20%
Teaching demonstration & lesson plan: 30%
Guest Speaker Reflection Assignments: 20%
materials: 中學英語文教材教法 (教育部 - 總策劃；葉錫南 - 主編)，五南書局出版。
remarks: 1. 本課程善用生成式 AI 作為教學設計和教材製作的輔助工具，同時也將適度地將 AI 工具融入教學活動中。2. 本課程有條件允許使用生成式 AI。在課堂作業或報告的「標題頁註腳」或「引用文獻後」部分，學生應簡要說明如何運用生成式 AI 進行議題思考、文句修飾或結構參考等用途。3. 所有本課程的作業，如果使用了生成式 AI，應該標明說明。若經查核發現未在作業或報告中標示使用，授課教師有權重新評分該作業或報告，或者甚至不予計分。** 修讀本課程的學生在選課時被視為已同意以上使用生成式 AI 的聲明。**
